Package splEvolutionCore.candidateSelector.valueAssignment.featureSelectionStrategies.templateSelection

Class FeatureSelectionBasedOnIntersectionOfConstructs

java.lang.Object
splEvolutionCore.candidateSelector.valueAssignment.featureSelectionStrategies.templateSelection.FeatureSelectionBasedOnIntersectionOfConstructs
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureSelectionBasedOnConstructsStrategy
public class FeatureSelectionBasedOnIntersectionOfConstructs extends Object implements FeatureSelectionBasedOnConstructsStrategy
Selecting features/feature based on intersection of constructs -constructs are evaluated amongst many variation points and chosen as the final choice
Author:
Jakub Perdek
